All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiException
 
Article
Represents an academic article retrieved from Google Scholar.
ArticleDAO
Handles all database operations related to Article objects.
Author
Represents an academic author retrieved from Google Scholar.
AuthorController
 
AuthorView
 
DatabaseConnection
 
GoogleScholarAPI
The GoogleScholarAPI class provides methods to interact with the SerpApi Google Scholar API It allows fetching author profiles and their published articles by using the author's Google Scholar ID This class handles HTTP requests, JSON parsing (using Gson), and converts API responses into Java model objects such as Author, Article, and Interest Usage Example: GoogleScholarAPI api = new GoogleScholarAPI(); Author author = api.getAuthorProfile("LSsXyncAAAAJ"); List articles = api.getArticles("LSsXyncAAAAJ"); Note: You must provide your SerpApi key inside the config.properties file under the property name "serpapi.api_key".
